items.title: Exxon Steps Back From Texas Gulf Coast Plastics Plant
items.description: Exxon Mobil will postpone its plans for a large new plastics production plant on the Gulf Coast of Texas, according to the company. items.description: The federal government is raising the required oxygen level in an urban stretch of the Delaware River near Philadelphia to improve conditions for fish and humans, but the move faces pushback from wastewater utilities that will have to pay millions of dollars for infrastructure upgrades to comply with the new rule. items.title: Detroit Is the Nation’s Most Challenging City for People with Asthma, a New Report Suggests
items.description: In the Motor City, it’s more than just vehicle exhaust causing problems for people living with asthma.
